enumeratedValue.description: HSCMP0 output drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0
FTM1 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0
PDB channel 1 trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1
FTM2 channel match drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1
HSCMP0 output drives FTM0 hardware trigger 2
HSCMP1 output drives FTM0 hardware trigger 2
HSCMP0 output drives FTM1 hardware trigger 0
FTM0 channel match drives FTM1 hardware trigger 0
PDB channel 1 trigger drives FTM1 hardware trigger 1
FTM2 channel match drives FTM1 hardware trigger 1
HSCMP0 output drives FTM1 hardware trigger 2
HSCMP1 output drives FTM1 hardware trigger 2
HSCMP0 output drives FTM2 hardware trigger 0
FTM0 channel match drives FTM2 hardware trigger 0
PDB output trigger 1 drives FTM2 hardware trigger 1
FTM1 channel match drives FTM2 hardware trigger 1
HSCMP0 output drives FTM2 hardware trigger 2
HSCMP1 output drives FTM2 hardware trigger 2

field.name: FTM1ICH0SRC
field.description: FTM1 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

field.name: FTM2ICH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

field.name: FTM2ICH1SRC
field.description: FTM2 Channel 1 Input Capture Source Select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM2_CH1 pin is fed to FTM2 CH1

FTM2_CH1 pin XOR FTM2_CH0 pin XOR FTM1_CH1 pin is fed to FTM2 CH1 If this field is set, then the three input pins feed FTM2 channel 1 input capture. In this case, FTM1 channel 1 cannot be used for input capture of FTM1, as it has no pin. FTM1 channel1 can be used for Output Compare mode of FTM1, though without an output
FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN0 pin
FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN1 pin
FTM0 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN2 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN0 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN1 pin
FTM1 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN2 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN0 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN1 pin
FTM2 external clock driven by FTM_CLKIN2 pin
UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output
UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output
UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output
UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output
Open drain is disabled on UART0
Open drain is enabled on UART0
Open drain is disabled on UART1
Open drain is enabled on UART1
DMA channel 0 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 1 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 2 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 3 transfer last write complete
Pre-trigger A for ADC0. Clearing this field will result in ADHWTSA=1 and ADHWTSB=0
Pre-trigger B for ADC0. Setting this bit will result in ADHWTSA=0 and ADHWTSB=1
Alternate trigger selected for ADC0 as defined by ADC0TRGSEL
DMA channel 0 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 1 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 2 transfer last write complete
DMA channel 3 transfer last write complete
Pre-trigger A for ADC1. Clearing this field will result in ADHWTSA=1 and ADHWTSB=0
Pre-trigger B for ADC1. Setting this bit will result in ADHWTSA=0 and ADHWTSB=1
Alternate trigger selected for ADC1 as defined by ADC1TRGSEL

field.name: FTM0SYNCBIT
field.description: FlexTimer 0 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM0; this allow the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM0TRG0SRC]
If TRIG0 enabled, this refreshes the FTM0CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM0 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: FTM1SYNCBIT
field.description: FlexTimer 1 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM1; this allows the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM1TRG0SRC]
If TRIG0 enabled, this refreshes the FTM1CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM1 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: FTM2SYNCBIT
field.description: FlexTimer 2 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM2; this allows the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM2TRG0SRC]
If TRIG0 is enabled, this refreshes the FTM2CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM2 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: CARRIER_SELECT
field.description: Carrier frequency selection for FTM0/2 output channel

enumeratedValue.description: FTM1_CH1 output provides the carrier signal for Timer Modulation mode
LPTMR0 prescaler output provides the carrier signal for Timer Modulation mode

field.name: FTM0OCH0SRC
field.description: FTM0 channel 0 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH0 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 0 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH0 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 0 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH1SRC
field.description: FTM0 channel 1 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH1 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 1 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH1 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 1 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH2SRC

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH2 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 2 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH2 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 2 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH3SRC
field.description: FTM0 channel 3 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH3 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 3 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH3 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 3 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH4SRC
field.description: FTM0 channel 4 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH4 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 4 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH4 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 4 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.description: FTM0 channel 5 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH5 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 5 PWM/OCMP
FTM0CH5 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 5 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM2OCH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 0 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.description: FTM2CH0 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 0 PWM/OCMP
FTM2CH0 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 0 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: LPTMR
field.description: Low Power Timer Clock Gate Control

enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Doze mode
Flash is disabled for the duration of Doze mode
8 KB of program flash memory, 0.25 KB protection region
16 KB of program flash memory, 0.5 KB protection region
32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region
64 KB of program flash memory, 2 KB protection region
128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region
256 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region
32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region
Internal 1 kHz clock is source to WDOG
